item.title: Judge to decide fate of Trump's federal buyout offer
item.description: A federal judge in Boston Monday will consider whether to block President Trump's plan to buy out tens of thousands of federal employees.

item.title: WATCH: 1-of-a-kind animal shelter helps the little guys
item.description: The Pipsqueakery in Bloomington, Indiana, cares for 700 small animals at a time.

item.title: Philadelphia Eagles win Super Bowl LIX with commanding performance
item.description: The Philadelphia Eagles won Super Bowl LIX in New Orleans on Sunday.

item.title: Super Bowl halftime performer detained after unfurling Sudan-Palestine flag
item.description: Super Bowl halftime performer detained after unfurling Sudan-Palestine flag

item.title: WATCH: Thieves begin targeting eggs
item.description: The bird flu outbreak has sent the price of eggs to record highs, leading to egg thefts in Seattle and Pennsylvania.
